testsuite.name: itmo.is.endpoint.EndpointTest
testsuite.system-out: Testing CORS headers: Access-Control-Allow-Origin should be set Access-Control-Allow-Methods should include GET, POST, PUT, DELETE Access-Control-Allow-Headers should include Content-Type POST /api/routes with valid data - OK Testing expected HTTP response codes: GET /api/locations - 200 OK GET /api/locations/1 - 200 OK GET /api/locations/999 - 404 Not Found POST /api/locations - 200 OK (valid data) POST /api/locations - 400 Bad Request (invalid data) PUT /api/locations/1 - 200 OK DELETE /api/locations/1 - 200 OK DELETE /api/locations/999 - 404 Not Found POST /api/locations with valid data - OK Testing Content-Type headers: All endpoints should accept: application/json All endpoints should produce: application/json GET /api/routes - OK GET /api/routes/1 - OK POST /api/routes - OK PUT /api/routes/1 - OK DELETE /api/routes/1 - OK GET /api/locations/999 - Should return 404 GET /api/routes/999 - Should return 404 POST /api/locations with empty name - Should return 400 POST /api/routes with negative rating - Should return 400 GET /api/locations - OK GET /api/locations/1 - OK POST /api/locations - OK PUT /api/locations/1 - OK DELETE /api/locations/1 - OK
